definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: The Qing Dynasty is the Anhui local chronicle development prosperous time.
sentences.chinese: 清代是安徽方志发展的鼎盛时期。

sentences.english: The compilation of index of local chronicles started from 30's of last century.
sentences.chinese: 方志索引的编制始于上个世纪30年代。

sentences.english: Folkway is a general topic in all kinds of local chronicles.
sentences.chinese: 民风是各类地方志都会涉及到的普遍话题。

sentences.english: Everything in the game was created on the basis of archive photos and other chronicles.
sentences.chinese: 一切都在游戏中已建立的基础上存档照片及其他方志。

sentences.english: Both library and local chronicles have long histories in China.
sentences.chinese: 图书馆与地方志在我国都有着悠久的历史。

sentences.english: A period of time, I began to pay attention along the southeast coast of the Ming and Qing gazetteers.
sentences.chinese: 一个时期内，我开始注意东南沿海的明清方志。

sentences.english: Led by Fang Zhimin, we made our way to northeast Jiangxi.
sentences.chinese: 在方志敏领导下，我们开到赣东北。

sentences.english: China's emperors became the major force that pushed the style of China's local records forward.
sentences.chinese: 中国帝王成了推动中国方志文体发展的最强大力量。

sentences.english: In the Qing Dynasty, the scholars in Yangzhou carried out an intensive research into the science of local chronicles.
sentences.chinese: 清代扬州学者在方志学方面曾进行过比较深入的研究。

sentences.english: I was confused by the topography and… the geography and chorography.
sentences.chinese: 我被地势地形地方志搞混了。

sentences.english: The Chronicles Of course, Ming and Qing Dynasties is an important historical Sung.
sentences.chinese: 明清的方志当然又是宋史的重要史料。

sentences.english: Orography is a kind of local gazetteer, it has a long history.
sentences.chinese: 山志是地方志中专志的一种，编纂历史源远流长。

sentences.english: Fang Zhimin's poor life rely his riches in the world of spirit as his pillar.
sentences.chinese: 方志敏的清贫生活依靠精神世界的富有作支柱。

sentences.english: This paper does a textual research about his native place basing on the original book and other chorographies .
sentences.chinese: 论文从原书及各地方志入手，对其里籍作了考辨。

sentences.english: The book was not recorded in the chorography of Changshu city.
sentences.chinese: 常熟市地方志未载《外科选要》一书。

sentences.english: Apperence in late Qing dynasty like others, the Xiangtuzhi of Guizhou is effected by Guizhou chorography.
sentences.chinese: 贵州乡土志出现于清末，受地方志的影响。

definition: general history of a county/county annals
